article.author: Princess Cruises
article.title: Go Together | Princess Cruises<sup style="font-weight: 500;">®</sup>
article.lead: Princess<sup>®</sup> guests are people people, who know a greater connection lies when you're actually in the moment, together. They know that this beautiful world is better experienced together. Unpack once and visit many destinations. Go Together.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2RzUU0R_p80?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Manulife
article.title: Alycia – Saved by Travel Insurance
article.lead: Alycia tells her tale of what happened when things went wrong on a trip and how Manulife was there to help.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RuSuKUqPbI8?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Silversea
article.title: Let Silversea Take You Closer to the Authentic Beauty of Northern Europe
article.lead: Witness the fiery spectacles of Iceland, or the wild beauty and wildlife of Norway and the Scottish Isles. You can cruise down the Thames from London or transit the Kiel Canal aboard our smaller ships. Whether you're drawn to cathedrals or the countryside, the sublime beauty of Northern Europe will captivate you.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/i5CagQaMe6g?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>
